title: Learning to Get Up Across Morphologies: Zero-Shot Recovery with a Unified Humanoid Policy
summary: Fall recovery is a critical skill for humanoid robots in dynamic environments such as RoboCup, where prolonged downtime often decides the match. Recent techniques using deep reinforcement learning (DRL) have produced robust get-up behaviors, yet existing methods require training of separate policies for each robot morphology.
